DOC.detailed_description: The primary criterion peripheral endothelial function assess measure flow-mediated dilation ( reactive hyperemia-peripheral artery tone index ) . The pulmonary function assess measure force expiratory volume one second ( FEV1 ) , force vital capacity ( FVC ) total lung capacity ( TLC ) diffuse capacity lung carbon monoxide ( DLCO ) . The dyspnea assess New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) score . The exercise capacity assess 6-min walk test . Pulmonary arterial pressure record cardiac echography catheterization .
